dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringment notice Brookerichards.org (70.85.179.77) Heidicort
dmca.body:
----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Thursday, April 27, 2006 3:56 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringment notice
Brookerichards.org (70.85.179.77) Heidicortez.org (70.85.179.77)]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringment notice
Brookerichards.org (70.85.179.77) Heidicortez.org (70.85.179.77)]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
the address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Infringment notice
Brookerichards.org
(70.85.179.77) Heidicortez.org (70.85.179.77)
Date:         Thu, 27 Apr 2006 15:29:37 -0500
From:         Cherkashina, Tatyana <TCherkashina@playboy.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



April 27, 2006



ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

US



abuse@theplanet.com <mailto:abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Sir or Madam:

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at
*Brookerichards.org (70.85.179.77) Heidicortez.org (70.85.179.77)
*display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by
Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. (?Playboy?). All right, title
and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy.

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on
*Brookerichards.org (70.85.179.77) Heidicortez.org (70.85.179.77) *are
not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images on *Brookerichards.org (70.85.179.77) Heidicortez.org
(70.85.179.77) *and on all web pages under your control.

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following
links:

http://www.brookerichards.org/



http://heidicortez.org/



I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act
on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the
above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted
images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises
International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611,
Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is
tcherkashina@playboy.com.

We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter
immediately.

This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any
rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or
otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly
reserved.



PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.

Tatyana Cherkashina

Intellectual Property Assistant



cc: Ana Cashman, Esq.







Tatyana Cherkashina

Intellectual Property Assistant



Playboy Enterprises International, Inc.

680 N. Lake Shore Drive

Chicago, IL 60611

312.751.8000

- ---
This email message is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and
may contain confidential and privileged information.  Any unauthorized
review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited.  If you are not
the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply email and
destroy all copies of the original message.  If you are the intended
recipient, please be advised that the content of this message is subject
to access, review and disclosure by the sender's Email System
Administrator.












- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----

Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
